title: Rise of Gun
description:
A simulator of a weapons store in a world overrun by zombies after a global epidemic. The entire world is enveloped in darkness, but humans have not given up and are fighting to the end. After losing his family, the main character sets out in search of survivors in despair. Run Pizza Run
The journey was difficult, but he was able to find a wonderful settlement with few people but all of them determined to rebuild the world. As the only master who can create weapons, the main character is very valuable in this town. The mayor of the town has allocated a shop with a workshop so that we can create and sell the weapons that we make.
